question: What is the fee for B.Tech Computer Science and Engineering at Sharda University?

question: What is the scholarship for Bangladeshi students in B.Tech programs at Sharda?
answer:
For B.Tech programs (all specializations), Bangladeshi students are eligible for:
- 50% scholarship on tuition fees for GPA 3.5-5.0
- 20% scholarship on tuition fees for GPA 3.0-3.4

The scholarship continues each year if you maintain passing grades and 75% attendance.

question: Can I get scholarship for BCA program at Sharda?
answer:
Yes! BCA programs are eligible for Group 1 scholarships:
- 50% scholarship on tuition fees for GPA 3.5-5.0
- 20% scholarship on tuition fees for GPA 3.0-3.4

question: What additional fees do I need to pay at Sharda University?
answer:
In addition to annual tuition fees, you need to pay:

1. Admission Fee (One Time): ₹30,000
2. Examination Fee (Per Semester): ₹6,000
3. Registration Fee from Second Year (Annually): ₹15,000

For International Students:
- 1st year: ₹10,000 (includes Application Fee, AIU certification/equivalence assistance, 1st year Medical Insurance, Medical Check up, FRRO/Police verification/Visa Extension Assistance)
- 2nd Year Onwards: ₹5,000 per annum

question: What are the international student charges at Sharda?
answer:
For International Students (including Bangladeshi students), additional charges are:

1st year - INR 10,000 which includes:
- Application Fee
- AIU certification/equivalence assistance only
- 1st year Medical Insurance Charges
- 1st year Medical Check up Charges
- FRRO/Police verification/Visa Extension Assistance only for the first time

2nd Year Onwards - INR 5,000 per annum

question: How do scholarships work at Sharda for Bangladeshi students?
answer:
Sharda University offers scholarships to Bangladeshi students based on HSC GPA in 4 groups:

Group 1 (B.Tech, BBA, MBA, BCA, MCA, B.Com, B.Arch, LLB Integrated, etc.):
- 50% scholarship for GPA 3.5-5.0
- 20% scholarship for GPA 3.0-3.4

Group 2 (B.Sc Nursing only):
- Fixed 25% scholarship for GPA 3.0-5.0

Group 3 (Most BA, B.Sc programs):
- Fixed 20% scholarship for GPA 3.0-5.0

Group 4 (MBBS, BDS, Pharmacy, M.Sc Nursing, MPT):
- NO scholarship available

Scholarships continue if you maintain passing grades and 75% attendance.

question: I have GPA 3.6, what scholarship will I get for B.Tech?
answer: With GPA 3.6 for B.Tech programs, you are eligible for a 50% scholarship on tuition fees (since 3.6 falls in the 3.5-5.0 range). This scholarship continues each year if you pass all subjects and maintain 75% attendance.

question: I have GPA 3.2, what scholarship can I get?
answer:
With GPA 3.2, your scholarship depends on the program:

- Group 1 programs (B.Tech, BBA, MBA, BCA, B.Com, B.Arch, etc.): 20% scholarship
- Group 2 (B.Sc Nursing): 25% scholarship
- Group 3 (Most BA, B.Sc programs): 20% scholarship
- Group 4 (MBBS, BDS, Pharmacy, M.Sc Nursing, MPT): NO scholarship

answer:

question: Can I get scholarship if I have exactly 3.5 GPA?
answer:
Yes! With exactly 3.5 GPA, you qualify for:
- 50% scholarship for Group 1 programs (B.Tech, BBA, MBA, BCA, etc.) - the 50% range is 3.5-5.0 (inclusive)
- 25% scholarship for B.Sc Nursing
- 20% scholarship for Group 3 programs (most BA, B.Sc)
- NO scholarship for Group 4 programs (MBBS, BDS, Pharmacy, etc.)

question: Do I need to maintain scholarship every year?
answer:
Yes, to continue your scholarship from the second year onwards at Sharda University, you must:
1. Pass all your subjects without any backlogs
2. Maintain at least 75% attendance

If you meet these requirements, your scholarship continues at the same percentage throughout your studies.

question: What is the total cost for 4 years of B.Tech CSE including all fees?
answer:
For B.Tech CSE (4 years) at Sharda University, total costs are:

Tuition fees (4 years): ₹2,70,000 + ₹2,78,100 + ₹2,86,443 + ₹2,95,036 = ₹11,29,579

Additional fees:
- Admission Fee (one time): ₹30,000
- Examination Fee (8 semesters × ₹6,000): ₹48,000
- Registration Fee (3 years × ₹15,000): ₹45,000
- International Student charges (1st year ₹10,000 + 3 years × ₹5,000): ₹25,000

Total without scholarship: ₹12,77,579

With 50% scholarship (GPA 3.5-5.0): Approximately ₹7,13,790 (50% off tuition only)
With 20% scholarship (GPA 3.0-3.4): Approximately ₹10,51,917 (20% off tuition only)

question: What programs are eligible for 50% scholarship?
answer:
The following programs are eligible for 50% scholarship (with GPA 3.5-5.0) for Bangladeshi students:

- B.Tech – All Specializations
- BBA – All Specializations
- MBA – All Specializations
- BCA – All Specializations, MCA
- B.Com
- B.Arch & B.Design, Masters in Design
- BA – Film, Television (Film Television & OTT Production)
- LLB – Integrated (BBA LLB, BA LLB)
- BJMC (BA Journalism & Mass Communication), MJMC, M.Advertising
- B.Sc. – Radiology, BMLT, Cardiovascular Technology, Forensic Science, Optometry, Nutrition & Dietetics, Dialysis Technology
- M.Sc. – Clinical Research, Forensic Science, Nutrition & Dietetics

question: Which programs do NOT get any scholarship?
answer:
The following programs are NOT eligible for any scholarship for Bangladeshi students, regardless of GPA:

- MBBS (Bachelor of Medicine, Bachelor of Surgery)
- BDS (Bachelor of Dental Surgery)
- All Pharmacy programs (B.Pharm, D.Pharm, Pharm D, M.Pharm)
- M.Sc. Nursing
- Medical M.Sc. programs
- MPT (Master of Physiotherapy)

These programs fall under Group 4 of the scholarship policy.

question: I have GPA 2.9, can I get any scholarship?
answer:
Unfortunately, with GPA 2.9, you do not qualify for any scholarship at Sharda University. The minimum GPA requirement for all scholarship categories is 3.0.

Scholarship requirements:
- Group 1: GPA 3.0-3.4 for 20%, GPA 3.5-5.0 for 50%
- Group 2: GPA 3.0-5.0 for 25%
- Group 3: GPA 3.0-5.0 for 20%
- Group 4: No scholarships available

question: Can I get 50% scholarship for B.Sc Computer Science?
answer:
No, B.Sc. Computer Science falls under Group 3 programs, which receive a FIXED 20% scholarship for GPA 3.0-5.0, regardless of how high your GPA is.

If you want to be eligible for 50% scholarship with high GPA, consider:
- B.Tech Computer Science (Group 1)
- BCA (Group 1)
- MCA (Group 1)

These computer-related programs in Group 1 offer 50% scholarship for GPA 3.5-5.0.
